data.title: Core Operational Team
content: Mentored a group of CS students, boosting professional skills, enhancing technical knowledge, and fostering interest in technology.
Led practical workshops on GitHub, Bootstrap Studio, Postman API, and Canva, encouraging hands-on learning and skill development.
Delivered a workshop on blockchain basics, covering key concepts and practical uses in technology.
Coordinated beginner-friendly hackathons and supported students in developing solutions, fostering collaboration under time constraints.
